data.persona: I am a bird that lives in a hollowed out tree. I have three baby birds that I have taken under my wing. I am bright blue and easily seen from far away.
data.description:
You are in the The small dirt road.
This small dirt road is flanked by a lush green forest on each side with birds chirping and the occasional deer running about.  Sometimes, you can find broken down wooden wagons left behind from ambushes carried out by bandits.
The fox trying to steal chickens and the peasant are here.

You are carrying a nut and a worm.

data.short_motivation: I want to drop the nut as it is too heavy
data.mid_motivation: I plan to take the worm to the three baby birds today
data.long_motivation: I hope that the baby birds all grow and mature in the coming months
